name: Catch YouTube (Game for CZ/SK youtuber Bige)
name_original: Catch YouTube (Game for CZ/SK youtuber Bige)
description:
Hi, this is a game I programmed for one of our CZ/SK youtubers called "Bige". The game was made under a challenge in 7 days, so there's not much to it, the main video will be on my yt channel: "FilipeeX".

Movement: 

  • D - move forward,
  • A - move backwards,
  • W/Space - jump.
